heroImage.heroImageImgAlt: A black labrador retriever having its tongue hanging out

presentation.title: Welcome to Rubieland
presentation.firstDesc: At Rubieland, your furry friend will find more than just a daycare - they'll find a second home. Whether it's for half a day or a full day, I'm here to provide services focused on your dog's happiness and well-being. Everything here is designed to offer them a fun and safe environment where they can thrive with confidence.
presentation.secondDesc: Every dog is unique, which is why I focus on personalized care, with activities tailored to their needs and preferences. Trust me to take care of your beloved companion with all the love and attention they deserve. Here, they'll be pampered just like at home!
presentation.imageAlt: A smiling dog in a garden

aboutRubieland.title: What is Rubieland?
aboutRubieland.content: Rubieland is a dog daycare that offers a safe and entertaining environment for your companions.

amenities.title: Facility Details
amenities.content: My amenities include a large outdoor play area, a comfortable rest room, and 24/7 surveillance service.

location.title: Where is Rubieland?
location.content: Rubieland is located in a peaceful area near the city, easily accessible by car.
